page.title: 13BARNWELL PARK - FISHING
page.content: At Barnwell Park there are lots of fish you can catch e.g. tench, perch, roach, bream, dace, chub and pike.Some lakes are different because some are wildlife lakes and you can not fish there. Fishing is not encouraged on the wildlife lakes that is because the lead might kill the birds.Other rules in the park is that you must have a permit to fish there and you must have a rod licence and you must not drop litter.The disabled can fish there because there are special places to fish in.The best place to fish is where there are no weeds and lots of trees and bushes.The fishing points could be improved by covering over the mud with shingle or even concrete slabs, as has been done in the area specially prepared for disabled fishermen and fisherwomen.
